mapper.select: SELECT MI.INV_NO, MI.MTL_CODE, M.MTL_NAME, MI.WAREHOUSE_CODE, MI.LOCATION_CODE, MI.CURRENT_QTY, MI.ALLOCATED_QTY, MI.AVAILABLE_QTY, MI.LOT_NO, MI.LAST_MOVEMENT_DATE, MI.LAST_ADJUSTMENT_DATE, MI.ADJUSTMENT_REASON, MI.SAFETY_STOCK_ALERT, MI.CREATED_BY, MI.UPDATED_BY, MI.CREATED_DATE, MI.UPDATED_DATE FROM MATERIAL_INVENTORY MI JOIN MATERIALS M ON MI.MTL_CODE = M.MTL_CODE
